summary: Recommendation for an Honor and Merit Award for James W. McCord, Jr. for his work on improving the Agency's Audio-countermeasures Program.
title: Honor Recommendation for JAMES W. MCCORD, JR.
sender: Executive Secretary/HMAB, Director of Security, Deputy Director of Security, Acting Director of Security, Deputy Director for Support, Head of Career Service, Deputy Director of Operating Component, Deputy Director of Career Service.
